articles.author: Rachel Trent
articles.title: David Archuleta comes out as a member of the LGBTQIA+ community - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: Singer-songwriter and former "American Idol" contestant David Archuleta says he is a part of the LGBTQIA+ community. But he says that shouldn't mean he can't be a person of faith, too.
articles.content:
Singer-songwriter and former "American Idol" contestant David Archuleta says he is a part of the LGBTQIA+ community. But he says that shouldn't mean he can't be a person of faith, too.

articles.title: Democracy Day: Twitter CEO tweets Nigerian flag -- despite suspension - TheCable

articles.title: CDC investigating heart inflammation following COVID-19 vaccine - KSN-TV
articles.description: A cardiologist says these cases are very rare and represent a tiny fraction of the 130 million Americans who have been vaccinated with the Pfizer and Moderna vaccine.
